attributes.action: Build detention camps for anyone entering the country illegally.
attributes.additional_details: The government is failing the people, priority is given to illegal immigrants over military veterans, our money is being spent in a manner we do not agree with, instead of housing these criminals use this money to build detention camps on disused m.o.d land until deported.
attributes.background: Build detention camps for anyone entering the country illegally, by definition those entering illegally are criminals, no foreign criminal should be allowed to walk our streets and no criminal should get asylum, detain them awaiting deportation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Detain all illegal immigrants and put in camping sites on airfields
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736491
